data.name: TwoFactorEnabledAlert
data.value: Two-factor authentication is enabled on your account.

data.name: TwoFactorDisabledAlert
data.value: Two-factor authentication is not enabled. Enable it now to secure your account with an authenticator app such as Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, or Authy.

data.name: RecoveryCodesWarningText
data.value: You only have {0} recovery code(s) remaining. Generate new recovery codes before you run out.

data.name: EnforcedWarning
data.value: Your department requires two-factor authentication for administrators. Please complete setup before continuing.

data.name: SetupInstructions
data.value: To use an authenticator app, follow these steps:

data.name: SetupStep1
data.value: Download an authenticator app such as {0}, {1}, or {2}.

data.name: SetupStep2QR
data.value: Scan the QR code below with your app, or enter the key manually:

data.name: SetupStep3
data.value: Once scanned, enter the 6-digit code shown in your authenticator app:

data.name: InvalidCodeError
data.value: Verification code is invalid. Please check your authenticator app and try again.

data.name: SaveRecoveryCodesWarning
data.value: Important: Store these recovery codes in a secure place. Each code can only be used once. If you lose access to your authenticator app, you can use a recovery code to sign in.

data.name: DisableWarning
data.value: Disabling 2FA will reduce the security of your account. Your authenticator key will be reset.

data.name: DisableConfirmationText
data.value: Enter your current authenticator code to confirm you wish to disable 2FA:

data.name: VerifyIdentityDescription
data.value: This operation requires recent two-factor authentication verification. Please enter the current code from your authenticator app.

data.name: LoginTwoFactorDescription
data.value: Your login is protected with an authenticator app. Enter the 6-digit code from your app below.

data.name: RememberBrowserLabel
data.value: Don't ask again on this device for 30 days

data.name: UseRecoveryCodeLink
data.value: Lost access to your app? Use a recovery code

data.name: RecoveryCodeLoginDescription
data.value: You have lost access to your authenticator app. Enter one of your recovery codes below. Each recovery code can only be used once.
